item.title: You can now also join the special head voices telegram group to stay up to date with this blog!
item.author: cpbotha@cpbotha.net (Charl P. Botha)
item.description: As an alternative to the email list, I have just setup a telegram group which you could join if you’d like to be kept up to date with posts from this blog via instant messenger! If all goes according to plan, a notification should be sent to the group automatically whenever I publish a post over here. P.S. I first did this with IFTTT’s Telegram applet, but its post preview was pretty bad.
item.content:encoded:
As an alternative to the email list, I have just setup a telegram group which you could join if you’d like to be kept up to date with posts from this blog via instant messenger!

If all goes according to plan, a notification should be sent to the group automatically whenever I publish a post over here.

P.S. I first did this with IFTTT’s Telegram applet, but its post preview was pretty bad. TheFeedReaderBot seems to do a much better job!
